props.name: btnId
props.description: A unique identifier for the menu

props.name: noRipple
props.description: Don't Apply ripple click effect to option links

props.name: position
props.description: Positions menu above or below button { 1: 'top-left', 2: 'top-right', 3: 'bottom-left', 4: 'bottom-right' }

slots.name: (default)
slots.description: The default slot holds the menu text and can contain HTML

events.name: selected
events.description: Dispatched when the menu is selected (return menuitem)
